report.title: Week verification breakdown
report.description: Breaks down records by week and verification status for the last year.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(0,52) as weeks(no) left join occurrences o on date_trunc('week', o.verified_on)=date_trunc('week', CURRENT_DATE - (weeks.no*7)) and o.verified_on is not null #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_id
param.description: ID of location to return records for. This must be an indexed location using the Spatial Index Builder.
param.join: join index_locations_samples ils on ils.sample_id=o.sample_id and ils.location_id=#location_id#

param.name: currentUser
param.description: ID of user to report on.

column.name: queried
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'D' then o.id when 'S' then o.id else null end)

column.name: verified
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'V' then o.id else null end)

column.name: rejected
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'R' then o.id else null end)
